name: Cellabus
long_description:
Cellabus is a device-centric classroom management solution. Our cloud based Mobile Device Management helps schools manage large numbers of different types of devices in diverse settings and quantitatively measure impact of technology on student engagement and learning outcomes. Our teachersâ€™ tools helps teachers ensure that their students are on task, interact with them in a digital classroom setting and discover relevant content and distribute directly to the devices of their students.

Cellabus is a member of the Imagine K12 Accelerator (http://www.imaginek12.com/) and Alchemist Accelerator (http://www.alchemistaccelerator.com) programs.
